name: Netbook Facebook v1.01 [formerly Neat Facebook]
description:
- completely removes ads
- uses all monitor space (on NETBOOK with 1024x600)

Any comments and reports will be highly appreciated.
css:
@-moz-document domain("facebook.com") {
/* ############### GENERAL ################# */


#pagelet_side_ads { display: none !important; }				/* hide ads */

#timeline_top_section { width: 985px; }						/* make cover image bigger */


/* ############### TIMELINE ################# */

#rightCol { display: none; }								/*hide years column*/
.fbTimelineCapsule { width: 985px; }						/*increase timeline width*/
ol[data-pnref="story"] { width: 645px !important; }			/*increase content column*/

.fbTimelineCapsule:nth-child(2),
.fbTimelineCapsule:first-child
	{width: 855px !important; }								/*place content col near left col*/

.fbTimelineComposerUnit { width: 642px !important; }		/*increase top composer block*/

.topBorder, .bottomBorder { visibility:hidden; }			
.timelineReportContainer, 
.timelineUnitContainer
	{ border-left: none !important; 
  	border-right: none !important; }						/*hide borders*/

.stickyHeaderWrap, 
.stickyHeaderWrap .back 
	{ width: 985px !important; }							/*increase floating top menu*/


/* ############### ABOUT ################# */


#pagelet_timeline_medley_friends,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_movies,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_music,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_books,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_photos,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_games,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_reviews,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_app_playfoursquare,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_about,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_likes,
#pagelet_timeline_medley_groups, 
#pagelet_timeline_medley_fitness 
	{ width: 635pt; margin: 20px 60px; }			/* Pagelets of interests */

div[aria-role="tabpanel"] { width: 823px; }			/* adjust pagelet's content width */

.sectionHeader 
	{ width: 100%; margin-left: 60px; }				/* Header between pagelets */


/* ############### HOME ################# */


#contentArea { width: 795px !important; }
#pagelet_composer+div { display: none !important; }


/* ############### SEARCH ################# */


#initial_browse_result { width: 600pt; }			/* SEARCH results' width */
}
